channel.title: ~~!Website help needed!~~
channel.description:
hello all.
i was wondering if i could add a front page to my forum, my forums adress is www.z4.invisionfree.com/raider_forums, and the front page i would like is www.freewebs.com/raider-forums
does anybody know how i could join them? or if there is hosts that let you? :rolleyes:
help really appreciated

item.description:
@ikick221 wrote:

Sorry with forums like invision free, smfforfree2 or any of those websites you can have front pages, modifications etc because they are just the forums. No website. Sorry to break the news.
